sentences.en: a terrorist bomb that left 168 people dead
sentences.cn: 恐怖分子引爆造成168人死亡的炸弹

sentences.en: All terrorist crime is detestable, whoever the victims.
sentences.cn: 无论受害者是谁，一切恐怖主义罪行都是可憎的。

sentences.en: Bush as a terrorist has said he would fight the airline's ruling.
sentences.cn: 该澳大利亚人表示他会与航空公司的决定斗争到底.

sentences.en: But chemical agents, lethal viruses and shadowy terrorist networks are not easily contained.
sentences.cn: 但是化学制剂和致命病毒以及隐蔽的恐怖主义网不是那么容易就能被控制的.

sentences.en: China's foreign ministry called the incident an " inhumane terrorist deed. "
sentences.cn: 中国外交部称该事件为一桩 “ 不人道的恐怖行为 ”.

sentences.en: He tipped off the police about the terrorist plot.
sentences.cn: 他把这场恐怖主义阴谋泄漏给了警方.

sentences.en: How do terrorist organizations infuse this condition in their recruits?
sentences.cn: 恐怖组织如何把这种能力灌输给他们的新兵?

sentences.en: It also pioneered terrorist tactics that Fatah later copied.
sentences.cn: 哈马斯还率先采用了法塔赫随后复制过去的恐怖主义战术.

sentences.en: Materazzi, meanwhile , was quoted as denying the terrorist comment.
sentences.cn: 然而,据称马特拉齐否认他说过这样的话.

sentences.en: Six people were killed in the terrorist attack on the airport.
sentences.cn: 6人在机场的恐怖主义袭击中被杀害.

sentences.en: Some of that money ends up in the hands of terrorist organizations.
sentences.cn: 那些钱有些最后落到了恐怖组织的手里.

sentences.en: The district was put on red alert during a terrorist bomb scare.
sentences.cn: 这个地区在得到恐怖主义者轰炸后作了应急准备.

sentences.en: The investigation is being handled by Scotland Yard's anti-terrorist branch.
sentences.cn: 调查由伦敦警察厅反恐部门负责。

sentences.en: They point to terrorist acts committed in the name of the religion.
sentences.cn: 他们指向了以宗教名义实施的恐怖主义行为.

sentences.en: They set about disbanding the terrorist groups.
sentences.cn: 他们开始解散恐怖主义组织。

sentences.en: We refuse to talk to terrorists.
sentences.cn: 我们拒绝和恐怖分子对话。

words.tran_cn: 恐怖；恐怖行动；恐怖时期；可怕的人
恐怖主义；恐怖行动；恐怖统治

trans.tran_en: someone who uses violence such as bombing, shooting etc to obtain political demands
